# Learn C++ Game devlopment 

| - [resource](https://www.udemy.com/course/cpp-fundamentals/)

### environment
| Language | Library | OS      | Editor    |
|----------|---------|---------|-----------|
| C++      | Raylib  | Arch Linux   | VS Code   |

### install library
`sudo pacman -S raylib`
